name: SAP Logistics Chain
description: End-to-end flows: order-to-cash, procure-to-pay, key documents across FI/SD/MM/EWM/LE.
best_practices: Follow complete document flow from order to invoice
Verify table/field via SAP Help MCP
Track document flow using document numbers
Understand integration points between FI, SD, MM, EWM, and LE

anti_patterns.name: Not following document flow
anti_patterns.problem: Missing or incorrect data in downstream processes
anti_patterns.fix: Follow complete flow: Sales Order → Delivery → Billing → FI Posting

anti_patterns.name: Ignoring cross-module integration
anti_patterns.fix: Understand how SD, MM, EWM, LE integrate with FI

anti_patterns.name: Not tracking document numbers
anti_patterns.fix: Use document numbers to link documents across modules
